author: as:ez.no
msg: - Use the correct classes ezcMailMtaTransport and ezcMailSmtpTransport instead
of the deprecated ones ezcMailTransportMta and ezcMailTransportSmtp.

author: as:ez.no
msg: - The IMAP, POP3 and SMTP transports and the ezcMailParser class can receive
options objects in the constructor. They can still receive options as arrays

msg: - Fixed RFC test cases after fix of memory backend.

author: kn:ez.no
msg: - Set mime type application/octet-stream on test files
